name: The Missing Dog
description:
A story that is based on a true life facts.

Our game is all about getting people to recover from anything they might have in life and learn something to.

How to play:

1. Click the gray bar.

2. Skip a full part with arrow and miss some story.

Warning: (Only press the arrow if you don't want to read the story)

Credits for this game:

Game Made By: BMW Games

Art By: Brett J Shockley

Writer: Tobie Shockley
